video.title: Dance Academy
video.synopsis: Fifteen-year-old Tara Webster's dream of dancing comes true when she gets into a top dance academy. She soon realizes dancing is only half the battle.

episodes.synopsis: Country girl Tara Webster travels to Sydney to audition for the prestigious National Academy of Dance.
episodes.title: Learning to Fly

episodes.synopsis: Tara arrives at the Academy excited about the year ahead but soon discovers that she is the worst dancer in the class.
episodes.title: Week Zero

episodes.synopsis: When Tara's crush on Ethan threatens to derail her friendship with Kat, Sammy gets her to write a pros and cons list to clear her head.
episodes.title: Behind Barres

episodes.synopsis: The students are given trust exercises to help forge connections with their pas de deux partners.
episodes.title: Minefield

episodes.synopsis: Sammy is forced to choose between dance and his father when compulsory Saturday ballet classes clash with his synagogue services.
episodes.title: Real Men Don't Dance

episodes.synopsis: The National Ballet comes to town, and Tara is thrilled to learn that Kat's mother is Natasha Willis, the company's principal dancer.
episodes.title: Perfection

episodes.synopsis: Christian reluctantly agrees to dance in Ethan's showcase but can't stand the derivative choreography.
episodes.title: Crush Test Dummies

episodes.synopsis: Abigail is devastated that her body seems to be developing and defies Miss Raine by wearing a loose top to class.
episodes.title: Growing Pains

episodes.synopsis: Kat choreographs a dance to one of Myles Kelly's songs and then posts it on the Internet.
episodes.title: Heartbeat

episodes.synopsis: Christian's best mate Aaron comes to stay and reveals the truth about the robbery they committed.
episodes.title: Through the Looking Glass

episodes.synopsis: Tara is excited when Ethan asks her to star in his choreography assessment piece, but Ethan only has eyes for his mentor, Dana.
episodes.title: One Perfect Day

episodes.synopsis: Pressure is building at the Academy as the students prepare for exams. Abigail pushes herself too far and severely restricts her eating.
episodes.title: Pressure

episodes.synopsis: It's Open Week at the Academy, and Tara discovers she is embarrassed by her unsophisticated parents -- especially around her new boyfriend, Ethan.
episodes.title: Family

episodes.synopsis: Tara returns from the holidays excited to have been awarded the first-year scholarship.
episodes.title: Turning Points

episodes.synopsis: Petra Hoffman arrives at the Academy on exchange from the Berlin Ballet School. Kat has been ditching class to spend time with her new boyfriend.
episodes.title: My Life en Pointe

episodes.synopsis: Kat is upset when her parents ignore her 16th birthday and throws herself a huge party at their harbor-front home as revenge.
episodes.title: Free Falling

episodes.synopsis: Tara is ostracized by her friends and further humiliated when photos of her and Christian kissing keep appearing everywhere.
episodes.title: A Midsummer Night's Dream

episodes.synopsis: Petra has decided to stay in Australia, but when the Berlin Ballet offers her a contract, she has a difficult choice to make.
episodes.title: Betty Bunheads

episodes.synopsis: Miss Raine has chosen Tara and Abigail to do daily private classes and Tara finally learns why Abigail hates her so much.
episodes.title: Fairest & Best

episodes.synopsis: When the Board decides to cut hip-hop and jazz from the curriculum, Kat goes on the warpath, blaming her mother for the change.
episodes.title: Ballet Fever

episodes.synopsis: Sammy and Abigail decide take their relationship to the next level, and Ethan is offered an early contract with the company.
episodes.title: FOMO: Fear of Missing Out

episodes.synopsis: Tara has been working hard in rehab with Ethan as her coach but is too scared to dance again.
episodes.title: Flight or Fight Response

episodes.synopsis: Christian is ready for his court date, but everything unravels when old loyalties cause him to change his story.
episodes.title: BFF: Best Friends Forever

episodes.synopsis: Abigail learns her parents are separating and puts everything she has into securing a solo role in "The Nutcracker."
episodes.title: Heatwave

episodes.synopsis: Rehearsals for "The Nutcracker" are under way, and Tara is playing the role of Clara.
episodes.title: The Deep End

episodes.synopsis: Tara continues to perform her "Nutcracker" role so badly that it seems Abigail will be recast in her place.
episodes.title: Learning to Fly: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: Tara reunites with her friends for her second year at the Academy and learns exciting news about a prestigious dance competition.
episodes.title: In the Middle, Somewhat Elevated

episodes.synopsis: Tara finds a new hero in Saskia Duncan, the youngest principal dancer in the Company's history.
episodes.title: Dreamlife

episodes.synopsis: Kat's struggle to find friends at normal school brightens when she's able to choreograph a project for drama class.
episodes.title: Faux Pas De Deux

episodes.synopsis: Tara is overjoyed when starlet Saskia Duncan is appointed to teach the Academy second years.
episodes.title: Legends

episodes.synopsis: Ethan clashes with Abigail in his attempt to create a spectacular dance performance for the showcase.
episodes.title: Showcase

episodes.synopsis: Sammy's little brother Ari arrives at the Academy, making Sammy's hectic schedule even more chaotic.
episodes.title: Like No One's Watching

episodes.synopsis: Concerned that the time she spends with Christian is cutting into her dance study, Tara suggests that they "pause" their relationship.
episodes.title: A Choreographed Life

episodes.synopsis: Realizing that Saskia's continuing critique of her dancing could jeopardize her midyear exams, Tara takes action.
episodes.title: Connectivity

episodes.synopsis: Exams are over, and with one night of freedom, both the boys and the girls go on a mission to prove they'll have more fun without each other.
episodes.title: The Break

episodes.synopsis: Sammy returns home for his Grandpa Morrie's funeral and to ask his father to support his Academy tuition.
episodes.title: A Good Life

episodes.synopsis: Grace encourages Tara to take action against Saskia's cruel treatment of her.
episodes.title: Self Sabotage

episodes.synopsis: Saskia's bullying of Tara results in a painful injury. Kat convinces Miss Raine to grant her an audition to return to the Academy.
episodes.title: Breaking Pointe

episodes.synopsis: Tara risks serious injury and possible expulsion to compete in the Prix de Fonteyn preliminary round.
episodes.title: Backstab

episodes.synopsis: While recovering from her broken back, Tara discovers a hidden side to Ben.
episodes.title: Rescue Mission

episodes.synopsis: As Tara negotiates her return to the Academy, Ethan's search for ongoing employment leads him to accept a position choreographing a fringe musical.
episodes.title: Moving On

episodes.synopsis: Sammy and Ollie's friendship heads into new territory when they go on a road trip so that Sammy can compete in a Prix de Fonteyn regional round.
episodes.title: Origins

episodes.synopsis: Tara becomes unhinged when Grace tempts her to get less serious.
episodes.title: Love and War

episodes.synopsis: During an excursion to the circus, Christian's dad makes promises he's unable to keep.
episodes.title: Catch Me If I Fall

episodes.synopsis: Tara hunts for a new crush, and the director of a fringe musical tries to convince Abigail to be the star of his show.
episodes.title: The Naturals

episodes.synopsis: Abigail's efforts to balance her ballet commitments with the fringe musical splinter when a leaked email discounts her chances in the Prix de Fonteyn.
episodes.title: Check? X

episodes.synopsis: The Academy students experience stinging prejudice from the judges during the National Round of the Prix de Fonteyn.
episodes.title: Ladder Theory

episodes.synopsis: Grace continues to make a play for Zach's attention, leading her to manufacture a serious accusation.
episodes.title: Win or Lose

episodes.synopsis: Ben tries a variety of tactics in rehearsals for "Peter Pan" to prove to Tara that he's a leading man.
episodes.title: Love It or Fight It

episodes.synopsis: Sammy decides to alter his Prix de Fonteyn solo one day before the start of the International Round.
episodes.title: The Prix De Fonteyn

episodes.synopsis: Fighting shock and numbness after a sudden tragedy, Tara is struggling to find her motivation as dancer.
episodes.title: The Second

episodes.synopsis: Abigail and Tara team up against a formidable enemy and Christian has to choose between being with the girl he loves and his desire to escape.
episodes.title: The Red Shoes

episodes.synopsis: Tara's plans for Abigail's surprise party clash with a tantalizing opportunity for Third Years to audition for the National Company's current ballet.
episodes.title: Glue

episodes.synopsis: It's an overwhelming first few days for the fill-in dancers. Christian continues to shirk responsibility and avoid returning to the Academy.
episodes.title: New Rules

episodes.synopsis: All is not well for Kat, who is desperately trying to pretend she's fine. Meanwhile, Christian's plans for a smooth return are derailed by the Board.
episodes.title: Second Chances

episodes.synopsis: Ben has to choose between the girl he cares for and the opportunity to partner with a principal dancer, while Ollie challenges Abigail to a dance-off.
episodes.title: Short Cut Clause

episodes.synopsis: Saskia schemes to arrange an early audition for her favorite student, but has disastrous results; Ollie creates a professional music video.
episodes.title: Negative Patterns

episodes.synopsis: Abigail auditions for a guest role in a dance movie, while Grace does everything she can to ensure she's allowed to go on the Third Year tour.
episodes.title: Fake It Until You Make

episodes.synopsis: Grace seems to have found a perfect match with life on the road, until Zach clamps down on declining standards during the Third Year regional tour.
episodes.title: Graceland

episodes.synopsis: The Third Years teach a class to a group of local kids, Tara feels old wounds re-opening, and Abigail has to face her past before she can let it go.
episodes.title: Travelling Light

episodes.synopsis: A career-making opportunity brings out the best and worst in everyone, and an injury that sidelines Ollie prompts him to use someone to get ahead.
episodes.title: Don't Let Me Down Gently

episodes.synopsis: Christian and Ollie prepare for a major hip-hop competition, Kat prepares to audition for a minor role in Coppelia, and Ben takes a stab at revenge.
episodes.title: N'Fektd

episodes.synopsis: The final auditions are approaching, but the dancers learn it'll be a whole new playing field; Christian and Tara come to a resolution.
episodes.title: Start of an Era

episodes.synopsis: Auditions for the Company have arrived, rousing superstitions, old rivalries and the performances that will determine the rest of the dancers' lives.
episodes.title: The Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: In their Company interviews, the students finally learn if they will receive a professional contract with the National Ballet Company.
episodes.title: Not For Nothing
